page.title: 09LIESURE AND RECREATION-2
page.content: {BADMINTON-}is played at the village hall weekly.There is also a bridge club.{KEEP-FIT-}classes are held weekly in the hall,costing 50p a session.{Senior Citizens EVERGREENS-} hold social evenings and also raise money for funds.Keep-fit lasts from 7p.m till 8pm.The teacher provides the music for the whole thing,the money goes to the hall funds so there are no hire charges.{BERRIEWOOD-}is a private school where children learn to ride ponies.The village hall is hired privately.Motor events,clay pigeon shooting and the caravan club all use the old airfield.Concerts in the church take place 4 times a year.Music lessons take place in the village(i.e. recorder and violin).Both Ryton and Condover have sections of the Women's Institute.
